articles.title: Germany inaugurates world’s first hydrogen-powered train fleet - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: A fleet of 14 trains powered entirely by hydrogen is launched in Germany’s Lower Saxony state.
articles.content:
Germany has inaugurated a railway line powered entirely by hydrogen, a world premiere and a significant step forward for green train transport despite nagging supply challenges.
